sentences.en: " Because you don't understand what I mean by'overtime '. "
sentences.cn: “ 笑你不懂两边工作. ”

sentences.en: " Can't you refuse to do overtime then? "
sentences.cn: 那你可以不去做的. ”

sentences.en: " What do you mean,'overtime '? "
sentences.cn: “ 什么两边的工作? ”

sentences.en: Denver had won the championship by defeating the Cleveland Browns 23-20 in overtime.
sentences.cn: 丹佛队在加时赛中以23比20击败克利夫兰布朗队夺得冠军。

sentences.en: Doctors work excessive unpaid overtime.
sentences.cn: 医生过度加班却无报酬.

sentences.en: Half say they get no overtime.
sentences.cn: 有一半人说他们没有加班。

sentences.en: He never complained about working overtime.
sentences.cn: 他从来不因加班而抱怨.

sentences.en: He pulls in a lot of overtime pay each month.
sentences.cn: 他每月挣得不少加班费.

sentences.en: He was paid for the overtime he worked.
sentences.cn: 他领到了加班费.

sentences.en: He’s been doing a lot of overtime recently.
sentences.cn: 他近来加班很多。

sentences.en: How about overtime meals, can we expense them?
sentences.cn: 加班就餐怎么办?我们能报销吗?。

sentences.en: If you go even one second overtime in these contests, you lose automatically.
sentences.cn: 在类似的比赛中，你即使只超时一秒，也会自动输掉比赛。

sentences.en: Many employees work countless hours of unpaid overtime.
sentences.cn: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.en: Many of our offices will be working on overtime until the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

sentences.en: Most member countries have already legislated against excessive overtime.
sentences.cn: 大多数成员国均已立法禁止超时加班。

sentences.en: On one particular Friday, I left the office after a week full of overtime and complete immersion in the work.
sentences.cn: 在一个普通的星期五，在一个星期的加班和在工作中完全的沉浸之后我离开办公室。

sentences.en: overtime pay/earnings/hours
sentences.cn: 加班费 / 收入 / 时间

sentences.en: She works overtime with her vacuum cleaner to keep grit out of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 她动用真空吸尘器力争不让厨房出现沙砾。

sentences.en: six hours’ overtime
sentences.cn: 六小时的加班

sentences.en: The firm wanted to chisel him out of his overtime pay.
sentences.cn: 公司想要剥夺他的超时加班费。

sentences.en: The newspaper staff worked overtime.
sentences.cn: 新闻工作人员超时工作

sentences.en: The union has imposed a ban on overtime.
sentences.cn: 工会制定了超时加班的禁令.

sentences.en: The union issued an order instructing its members not to work overtime.
sentences.cn: 工会发出指示,不让会员超时工作.

sentences.en: These new orders for our manufactures will mean working overtime.
sentences.cn: 这些订购我们产品的新订单意味着要加班.

sentences.en: They’re working overtime to get the job finished.
sentences.cn: 他们正在加班赶工。

sentences.en: to do/work overtime
sentences.cn: 加班

sentences.en: We had to battle very hard and our defence worked overtime to keep us in the game.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不奋力搏杀；为保证我们不被淘汰出局，防守队员拼尽了全力。

sentences.en: Workers in big firms receive a substantial part of their pay in the form of bonuses and overtime.
sentences.cn: 大公司的员工有相当一部分薪酬来自奖金和加班费。

phrases.tran_cn: 加班加点工作，超时工作

trans.tran_cn: 超出的时间，额外的时间，加班，加时赛，加班费
trans.tran_en: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours
